t: In this video, I am going to show you the new features in the InfoRapid KnowledgeBase Builder.

The latest version of the app allows you to create multiple items in a single session without having to repeatedly close the "Insert Item" dialog. As an example, I am creating a mind map to demonstrate how to write an essay, starting with the root item and the items on the first level. As you can see all new items are created as child items of the same parent item.
If you want to use a different parent item, you need to close and re-open the new item dialog.
To do so select the new parent item and press the "New Item" toolbar button again.

p: 🔍 Gather information and materials relevant to the essay topic
